scripts.cy:run_par: npm run cy:run_spec_loc -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:run_spec_loc -- --browser firefox & npm run cy:run_spec_loc -- --browser edge
scripts.cy:run_browser: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser edge
scripts.cy:run_browser_ff: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox && npm run report || npm run report
scripts.cy:run_browser_ch: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome && npm run report || npm run report
